resources.string: Soccer Sub Helper assists the coach with player substitutions of U6 and U8 soccer games. The goal of the program is to give each player equal playing time while mixing the players as much as possible and keeping back to back plays to a minimum.
To encourage volunteer coaching of youth soccer teams this app is free. If you find this app extremely useful and desire to pay for it please donate to your local soccer club.
No warranty of any kind are given
